Portal two, the sequal to portal 1 (obviously) greatly expands on the innovative gameplay of portal one adding numerous new levels and even new characters to the mix. Portal 2's story is excelent and filled with humor. But, the gameplay somewhat gets repetitive but the third act. 8.5/10

This game is my favorite game of all time. Just play this game. Just play it. But play the first one beforehand and you will get more out of the dialogue. This game is great, difficult but great, the humor is really enjoyable, and co op is dwn right fun. It's longet than the first story mode wise but don't expect loads and loads of replayability. The challenge maps and commounity built maps will add a bit of replayability but for the moste part I find myself playing this game when I need to hear Cave rant or GlaDOS's voice. This is a extreamly fun game and well worth any price tag, especially if you get games for the story and that doesn't mean the gameplay is lacking because it's really not at all. The gameplay is extreamlly fun and if you feel it's getting slow it's because your stuck, and honing your portal skills is very gratifying. There is one glitch that I have no idea how to fix other than reloging twice but besides that there are very few flaws in this game.

The best game I've ever played. Some say it's only 10-12 hours long (including both single and coop), but I enjoy playing it over and over again, both the custom maps and the story (the jokes never get old). You can also make your own puzzles using the map editor.

I finally got around to beating Portal 2. It was a great one. Once more Valve manages to provide flawless and fun gameplay with great narrative and storytelling, I admire the fact that in most of their games the main character doesn't speak. It still looks and feels great, even after almost 3 years after its release. It is fun both in single player and cooperative online multiplayer. There's tons of mods and user made maps out there so there's alot to play. If you're looking for a casual game to play with a friend or just by yourself there's no way in the world that you will go wrong with Portal 2, it's the sequel to one of the greatest first person puzzle games of all time.
I recommend you to buy this game. If you want a game that gives you a puzzle to solve with a portal gun. This game is for you.
yo.

Po prostu genialna gra. Żałuję że wcześniej nie zapoznałem się z serią Portal ale lepiej późno niż wcale. Zakończenie jest po prostu piękne - dawno tak się nie uśmiechałem po zakończonej grze. Tą grę będę jeszcze wspominał i często do niej wracał - trzeba przecież przejść kooperację :D

Jeder, der in einem Spiel auch einmal nachdenken möchte, sollte Portal 2 gespielt haben (oder es schleunigst nachholen). Während der erste Teil schon gut war, macht dieses Spiel nahezu alles besser. Es gibt neue Elemente wie diverse Gele und Laserstrahlen, neue Musik, welche man sich auch anhören kann, wenn das Spiel nicht läuft (der Soundtrack kann [url=http://www.thinkwithportals.com/music.php]hier[/url] kostenlos runtergeladen werden), und eine richtige Story, welche ihre lustigen und ernsten Momente hat.

Und wem das noch nicht reicht: Der Koop des Spiels sorgt für weitere Stunden an Denkaufgaben, dann zu zweit. Und auch da steckt wieder eine witzige Geschichte hinter, welche das Spiel noch untermalt.

Und wenn auch das noch nicht reicht: Mittlerweile gibt es Unmengen an Maps von Hobbyentwicklern, welche ohne größere Umstände direkt runtergeladen und gespielt werden können. Und falls man selbst plötzlich von der Muse geküsst wird, kann man mit einem einfachen Leveleditor einfache Level [strike]editieren[/strike] erstellen.

Definitiv zu empfehlen.
Отличная игра. Убил за неё довольно таки много времени

Another one of my favorites, Portal 2 offers great and sometimes challenging puzzles along with amazing graphics!

Portal 1 and 2, taken as a single unit, is possibly the best gaming experience i've ever had. The last time i called a game "my favorite game ever" was Another World/Out of This World, and that was a long time ago. Portal, and especially Portal 2, is written, designed, and scored with such excellence and ingenuity. Storytelling, drama, humor, and fantastic music, as well as true playability for gamers of all types, are the strengths i see here. i played through Portal 1 twice, and will soon play through Portal 2 a second time, just for the fun of it (and the commentary). i highly recommend this game. Even if you're not a hard core gamer (i'm not), you should play the Portal series. i experienced only moderate frustration on a couple levels/puzzles, but never once had to look for hints or cheats. i also experienced virtually zero bugs or crashes (i can't remember any crashes, though i might have forgotten something due to just totally loving this game). So again... Play Portal!

Cake and puzzles and serious verbal abuse, what's not to love? The character design is adorable and the co-op is a blast! High five your partner, watch him blow himself up and chortle, whatever strikes your fancy. If you like challenging your brain with puzzles but making a mess doing it then you found your game! GLaDoS wont let you down :) 8/10
Everything about this game is amazing. Nothing else needs to be said.

Review zu Portal 2
Das Spiel ist einfach super, Koopmodus und Einzelspieler beides top. Am Anfang war man wohl eins der Testobjekte von Aperture und dann kam Wheatly, der lustige Roboter, schon am Anfang war es lustig mit Wheatly als man "Apfel" sagen sollte. Das Spiel ist mit diesen ganzen Einstürzen usw super gemacht. Irgendwann ist man dann bei GlaDos die auch witzig ist. Und dann gibts noch die Dialoge zwischen GlaDos und Wheatly die einfach der Hammer sind. Man erfüllt also ganz "inruhe" Tests aber irgendwann... hat das testen ein Ende und GlaDos will ein töten, zum Glück ist Wheatly da und hilft einem GlaDos zubesiegen... was passiert dann als man GlaDos besiegt? Will ich jetzt ungern verraten für Leute die es noch nicht gespielt haben, das bringt aufjedenfall eine Wendung in das Spiel. Mit den "Gels", dem Kraftfeld oder dem "Licht" werden die Tests noch schöner gestaltet. Das Ende war auch richtig geil von Portal 2. 

Der Koopmodus
Bezieht sich ganz leicht auf den Einzelspieler, es gibt zwei Roboter, einer heißt P-Body und einer Atlas. Die Koopstory besteht aus 4. Teilen. Nach Abschluss des 4. Teils kommt noch ganz überraschend der 5. Teil, wo alles älter ist. Und wenn man den auch noch durch gespielt hat, kommt noch das Finale und dann kann man wenn man Lust hat noch den Zusatz spielen.

Wenn man den Koopmodus und den Einzelspieler durch gezockt hat, kann man mal die Community Testkammern ausprobieren oder sich eigene erstellen.

Fazit:
Portal 2 ist einer der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt hab und ein echtes MUST HAVE.

This game is a true masterpiece.

The visuals, audio, story, writing, gameplay, and every other aspect of this game is above and beyond your typical soulless mass-produced video game fodder.

Wheatley, GlaDoS, and Cave Johnson make for awesome and hilarious characters, and the interactions between the former two  feature some of the best comedy writing and voice acting I have ever heard.

The enviornments are beautiful and, especially once you get to the underground part of the game, work amazingly well to create a sense of foreboding, wonder, and curiosity on an epic scale. I remember my mind being blown the first time I was dumped into "Old Aperture Science". My one complaint is that in some areas, the huge world of Aperture seems visually bland, and not in the way that would be intended. Often, you'll find yourself looking through cracks in the wall or staring down into an abyss that contains nothing of visual interest. I felt this was a missed oppurtunity for making the setting seem even grander than it was.

The music in this game is amazing and does just as much as the visuals to create an atmosphere. It should be noted that you can download the whole of the soundtrack for free online right now. Just Google "Music to Test By".

All in all, a wonderful experience in storytelling. The multiplayer, though not quite as rich in the story aspect, is still marvelous. The recently added ability to create your own test chambers is also a lot of fun, and is a well-designed experience.

Az utóbbi 4-5 évben ez az első, játék ami több mint egy óráig folyamatosan képes volt lekötni. 
Tanács: A játék előtt olvasd el a képregényt amit a Valve kiadott, mert sokat dob az élményen!

(+) Folyamatos "FLOW" élmény játék közben, és minden pálya után zseninek éreztem magam XD
(+) A játék közbeni beszólások zseniálisak (különösen a Cave Johnson szövegek)
(+) A történet zseniális. 
(+) A játék nem nézi hülyének a játékost (mint a modern FPS-ek többsége)
(+) 4-5 -ször hoszabb mint a PORTAL 1
(+) Van pályaszerkesztő, és letöltheted más játékosok pályáit... Eddig csak olyan pályákat találtam amik sokkal nehezebbek mint a beépített SinglePlayer pályák...

(-) Az újdonságok ellenére sem jelentettek a pályák akkora kihívást a Portal 1 -hez képest. Ergo, effektíve könyebb pályák vannak még a végefelé is, mint az elődjében.  (bár lehet hogy a Co-op -ban nehezebb már)

当我第一次知道要让我玩传送门2的时候，其实我是拒绝的！因为我觉得……呀……你不能叫我玩，我就马上玩，第一，我要试玩一下，我又不想说……你玩完一个游戏以后加了很多特技，那傲娇Galdos啊，腹黑惠特利啊……咣~~~~~很费脑子！很剧情很赞！很有挑战性！结果同学们一定骂我，根本没有这种游戏！这证明上面那个是假的……我说先要给我试玩一下。后来我经过也知道它是V社的，而且没有看见人就突突突的成分。那……玩了这个月……这个月下来之后呢……起码我玩了很舒服。现在呢……每天还在玩！.....我还给了我基友玩！来！来！来！大家试试看！那我跟导演讲∶"玩的时候就拍！拍完之后，这个游戏就是我玩的游戏，就不要再加特技上去，就是这样子！我要给观众看到，我玩的时候是这样子，你们玩的时候，也是这样子！"

Portal 2, This game deserves it's own movie! it was the first puzzle game that actually got me thinking for a while not to mention it has a great story that will make you want more (like any other Valve game) you never get bored as you want to know more and more about what's happening and what will happen to you next.
If you need me to recommend this you are using your internet wrong.....If you haven't heard of Portal yet...YOU NEED TO STOP WATCHING PORN AND GET THIS GAME!!(and the first Portal as well)

So, when I first played Portal 2, it was a very wonderful experience. 

No spoilers here, but I will say, the plot was excellent, and the twist really did catch me off guard. The humor of CERTAIN characters where great (no mentioning who, no spoilers). I laughed consistently after every test chamber. It was great because a lot of the tests challenged my mind, so the bursts of humor really made the game flow. Then I played the 2-player story.

This was even better with a friend. The tests got harder because 2 heads are better than one. The humor got funnier, and smarter. Can I say, the 2-player story wasn't on par with the single player story, but the gameplay makes up for it. 

And finally, the replay value. Its excellent. With player made tests coming in play after play, you have a seemingly endless ammount of Portal to play till valve counts to three. 

I rate this game 9/10.
The World's #1 Scientific Method-themed Test Simulator.
Tato hra je skvělá jak pro jednoho hráče tak pro kooperaci s kamaradem :) ! Tuto hru můžu jen a jen doporučit :)

Portal 2 - a first person puzzle game, and an amazing story line, What more could you want?
the point of the game is you play as a test subject called Chell doing, well, tests, for a robot named GLaDOS with a Gun used for transportation known as the portal gun, I wont ruin the story so i'll leave it at that.
you can also play in Multiplayer mode and do challenging courses in Co-Operative champaign in which you play as 2 robots named P-Body and Atlas, or you can do levels that other people have designed themselves, this is a great game and has aged fantastically the only thing i can say is If you enjoy Puzzles and a Great story, This is the game for you.
Best fps-puzzle game ever, (at least untill now). No point to say anything else.
